vecUnachieved.strDescription: You spent 5 minutes in your Virtual Cottage. Welcome and we hope you like it here.
You've made the commitment of studying for 30 minutes. Good job!
One hour passed already? How do you like it here so far?
Three hours in! Wow, you are pretty serious getting things done.
Eight hours passed! Maybe call it a day for now and relax a little?
You've studied for 24h in total. That is one full day of being productive. Nice work!
Wow. 100h hours already passed since you first set foot into the Cottage. We are proud of you.

data.strFullDescription:
[b]Welcome to your Virtual Cottage! [/b]
Please stay as long as you like and enjoy a cozy, distraction-free environment.

Got some big, uncomfortable tasks you have been putting off for weeks? Virtual Cottage was made to help you start them. Upon entering your cottage, commit to an activity you want to accomplish. Enjoy the relaxing atmosphere to ease your start on whatever you want to get done.

[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1369320/extras/virtualcottagesteamgif3.gif?t=1667210465[/img]

[h2]Relaxing Lo-fi Soundtrack[/h2]
Virtual Cottage features amazing lo-fi music from various talented artists. To complete the relaxing atmosphere, a rain sound can be toggled on or off.
 Check out more of their work with the links below!

[h2]The cottage is wherever YOU are[/h2]
The game automatically syncs with your local time and displays a similar lighting scenario. If you are a night owl, just change your computer clock and the graphics will change as well. ;)

[h2]Getting things done[/h2]
There is no way to stop the timer, except for quitting the game. Once youâ€™ve entered an activity, stay committed and get started!
data.strSnippet: Virtual Cottage gives you a comfy place to rest and be productive without any distractions. Open the game, set yourself a goal and enjoy the atmosphere.
